trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes and deserializes SOAP methods.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos de atributos que controlam como o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa e desserializa métodos SOAP.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Creating a SoapAttributes is part of a process that overrides the default way the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes class instances.
trans-unit.target: Criar um SoapAttributes faz parte de um processo que substitui o padrão de forma a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa instâncias de classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL that has an inaccessible source.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que você deseja serializar um objeto que é criado a partir de uma DLL que tem uma origem inacessível.

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class, you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>classe, você pode aumentar ou controlar como o objeto é serializado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: The members of the SoapAttributes class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization.
trans-unit.target: Os membros da classe SoapAttributes correspondem diretamente a uma família de classes de atributos que controlam a serialização.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property must be set to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize the property value as an encoded SOAP attribute.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>propriedade deve ser definida um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, que permite que você substituir a serialização de um campo ou propriedade instruindo o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>para serializar o valor da propriedade como um atributo SOAP codificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of attributes that control encoded SOAP serialization, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista completa de atributos que controlam a serialização de SOAP codificada, consulte [atributos que controle codificado serialização SOAP](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more details about adding an instance of the SoapAttributes class to an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes sobre como adicionar uma instância da classe SoapAttributes a uma instância do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>de classe, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: For each member or class instance whose serialization is being overridden, you must create a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: Para cada instância de classe ou membro cuja serialização está sendo substituída, você deve criar um novo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Set the properties for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> as appropriate to the member or object, then add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class.
trans-unit.target: Definir as propriedades para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>conforme for apropriado para o membro ou objeto, e adicione- <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>uma instância da <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> class using the specified custom type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> classe usando o tipo personalizado especificado.

trans-unit.source: Any object that implements the <xref href="System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider"></xref> interface, such as the <xref:System.Type> class.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider"> </xref> interface, como a <xref:System.Type>classe.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"></xref> to override.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"> </xref> para substituir.

trans-unit.source: By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, se nenhum atributo for aplicado a um campo público ou propriedade pública de leitura/gravação, ele é serializado como um elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: You can also instruct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize a member as an encoded SOAP XML attribute by applying a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> to the field or property.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode instruir o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>para serializar um membro como um atributo XML de SOAP codificado aplicando um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>para o campo ou propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> must be created with an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> in order to serialize an object as an encoded SOAP XML stream.) The SoapAttribute property allows you to override the serialization controlled by applying a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> to the member.
trans-unit.target: (O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>devem ser criados com um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>para serializar um objeto como um fluxo XML de SOAP codificado.)</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> A propriedade SoapAttribute permite substituir a serialização controlada aplicando um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>ao membro.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more details on this process, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes sobre esse processo, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"></xref> that overrides the behavior of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> when the member is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"> </xref> que substitui o comportamento do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>quando o membro é serializado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor padrão de um elemento ou atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: The default value of a member can be set by applying a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> attribute to the member.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de um membro pode ser definido, aplicando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>para o membro de atributo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If the member is being serialized as an encoded SOAP message, you can change the default value by creating a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, setting its <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A> property, and setting the SoapDefaultValue property to the object.
trans-unit.target: Se o membro está sendo serializado como uma mensagem SOAP codificada, você pode alterar o valor padrão, criando um novo <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, configuração seu <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A>propriedade e definindo a propriedade SoapDefaultValue para o objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o valor padrão de um elemento ou atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> to override.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"> </xref> para substituir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> is used to control the serialization of a class member as an XML element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>é usada para controlar a serialização de um membro de classe como um elemento XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SoapElement property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> to override the serialization of a class member as an XML element by creating a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade SoapElement como um novo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>para substituir a serialização de um membro de classe como um elemento XML criando uma nova <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>e atribuí-la à propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Then add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adicione <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, then construct an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>com o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>em seguida, construa um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>com <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> to override.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"> </xref> para substituir.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a SOAP enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que especifica como o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa uma enumeração de SOAP.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> is used to control the serialization of an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>é usada para controlar a serialização de um membro de enumeração.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SoapEnum property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> to override the serialization of such a member.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade SoapEnum como um novo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>para substituir a serialização desse membro.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que especifica como o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa um membro de enumeração.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a public field or property as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa um campo ou propriedade pública como XML de SOAP codificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, todos os campos públicos e as propriedades públicas de leitura/gravação são serializadas por <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, o valor de cada campo público ou propriedade é mantido como um elemento XML ou atributo XML em um documento XML.

trans-unit.source: To override the default serialization of a field or property, create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and set its SoapIgnore property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir a serialização padrão de um campo ou propriedade, crie um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>e defina sua propriedade SoapIgnore como `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the object to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore and the name of the field or property to ignore.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>método para adicionar o objeto para um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>e especifique o tipo do objeto que contém o campo ou propriedade para ignorar e o nome do campo ou propriedade ignorar.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>é aplicado a um campo ou propriedade, campo ou propriedade é ignorada.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>

trans-unit.source: However you can override that behavior by creating a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, setting its SoapIgnore property to `false`, and adding it to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property and the name of the field or property.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode substituir esse comportamento, criando um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, definindo sua propriedade SoapIgnore como `false`e adicioná-lo para um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, especificando o tipo do objeto que contém o campo ou propriedade e o nome do campo ou propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>não deve serializar o campo ou propriedade; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that instructs the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> how to serialize an object type into encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que instrui o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>como serializar um tipo de objeto para codificação SOAP XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> can be used to control the XML stream generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: O que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>pode ser usado para controlar o fluxo XML gerado por <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SoapType property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> to control the schema for the XML that is generated when a class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade SoapType como um novo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>para controlar o esquema do XML que é gerado quando uma classe é serializada.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref> that either overrides a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref> applied to a class declaration, or is applied to a class declaration.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"> </xref> que substitui uma <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"> </xref> aplicado a uma declaração de classe ou é aplicado a uma declaração de classe.
